assembler

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • assembler.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parser parses provided line and converts to machine code using regex and most of the classes in package assembler

        java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String line)
        Parse provided line, by checking regular expressions for directives, mnemonics and labels

        Returns:
        machine code for that line

      • parseDirective

        java.lang.String parseDirective(java.lang.String line)
        Parse Directive and generate machine code
        Parameters:
        line - line that needs to be parsed for directive
        Returns:
        empty String if directive was not found, otherwise parsed directive

      • parseMnemonic

        java.lang.String parseMnemonic(java.lang.String line)
        Parse mnemonic and find the type of instruction
        Parameters:
        line - line that needs to be checked for mnemonic
        Returns:
        empty String if line does not contain mnemonic, otherwise return machine code
